tour.breakfast: Enjoy a Vada Pav for breakfast at Ashok Vada Pav, a great spot for outdoor dining in Mumbai.
tour.lunch: For lunch, try the iconic Pav Bhaji at Sardar Pav Bhaji.
tour.dinner: End your day with a cozy dinner featuring Misal Pav at Mamledar Misal.

tour.breakfast: Enjoy a Croissant for breakfast at Du Pain et des Idées, a great spot for indoor dining in Paris.
tour.lunch: For lunch, try the iconic Boeuf Bourguignon at Chez Janou.
tour.dinner: End your day with a cozy dinner featuring Crème brûlée at Le Comptoir du Relais.
